ygData.subject: RE: tinkered pets
ygData.msgSnippet: I thinke one cool thing about Tinkered pets would be maybe not even for fighting but maybe have it like a pack animal or soemthing. Say you big MEch spider
ygData.messageBody:
I thinke one cool thing about Tinkered pets would be maybe not even for
fighting but maybe have it like a pack animal or soemthing. Say you big MEch
spider that is like a 20 slot back pack that can hold alot of Items. Have it
have no attack ability and just carry stuff and if you die it stands buy
your body also make it zone with you it wouldn't take much. Or how about the
ability to make a portable House a little building big enough for you that
you can rest in that is just a fare thing but the pet idea would be neat or
maybe have differnet pets one that gaurds you like a gnome gaurd or one to
ride so you wont lose stamina many ideas but yes it would make gnomes a
little stronger but there are ways to make it even just have to work it out
say if you had the back pack animal you it takes time to go through it or if
it dies you loose your stuff. If it is a gaurd it can only go about 10 feet
from you and gaurd from being rushed een better make it so you can give
these pets to other people there fore it will make tinkering profitable but
this is just my 2cp thanks for listening.

Fanrick Magician/Tinkerer Tarew Marr.
